page.title: 05Dorset House Built 1980
page.content: Dorset House is an old people's home situated on Station Road in Wallsend. There are forty-four rooms altogether for residents.Forty-two are for the people who live there permanently and there are two holiday rooms.The head warden is called Mrs.Gibson.She has about thirty staff who work shifts.All of the residents have their own room with their own bed,wardrobe and personal items.they can even bring in a piano if they want to,but they are notallowed to keep pets in their own rooms.There is a budgie in the lounge. The residents are aged between sixty and ninety-seven.Each person has a buzzer in his or her room to get help when it is needed.State run,Dorset House is well decorated and there is a waiting list for places.
